oai_dc:dc.dc:title: ON A METHOD FOR ESTIMATING REFLECTION COEFFICIENT IN SHORT-CRESTED RANDOM SEAS
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Yokoki, Hirmune
Isobe, Masahiko
Watanabe, Akira
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: random sea
reflection
reflection coefficient
coefficient estimation
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: A method for estimating the directional spectrum as well as the reflection coefficient in a incident and reflected wave field is developed for practical uses. In the method, the directional spectrum is assumed to be expressed by a circular normal distribution which includes several parameters, Then the parameters are estimated by the maximum likelihood method. The validity of the method is verified by numerical simulation.
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: Coastal Engineering Proceedings; No. 24 (1994): Proceedings of 24th Conference on Coastal Engineering, Kobe, Japan, 1994.
